Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $15000. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $20000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your workflow. I trust that you will find this investment worthwhile. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
